Content_wSideColumn.Name: Travel Resources and Tips
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Travel Resources and Tips

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Bag Fees
A helpful list of baggage fees for the most common airlines
Travel Instructions for New Employees
New to the BYU-Idaho work force and need to travel? We'll explain all the steps you need to take to be on your way in no time
Helpful Links
Instructions for going through security, specific information regarding check-in procedures, and more useful information to make traveling easier and more efficient
Local/Regional Transportation
From taxis to Greyhounds, find information to help you get from A to B
Hotel Listings
BYU-Idaho has contracts with local hotels to assist with the lodging of overnight guests and conference planning. See the list of participating hotels here
Rent a Car
Useful information regarding the rental of cars for business trips
Mileage Chart
How long is the trip? Find out here!
Per Diem Chart
Depending on where you're going, you may pay a standard rate or a high rate for meals. Check here to find which cities are at which rates
SOS
International SOS provides emergency information for travelers, whether it be medical assistance or country-related information. Check here for more information
Passports
Important information to help you get your passport quickly and efficiently
Diamond Parking Services
Diamond Airport Parking on North Temple is a self-park, offsite airport parking facility that offers discounted prices for BYU-Idaho employees. Check here for more information
